Q.27. THE ARMY IS PLANNING TO SET UP A C.B.I. BRANCH OF THE ARMED FORCES INSTITUTE TO GIVE LESSONS BY MAIL TO THE MEN IN THIS THEATER. HAVING A BRANCH HERE IN THE THEATER WOULD MEAN THAT THE LESSONS AND INSTRUCTIONS COULD BE SENT TO THE MEN MUCH QUICKER THAN THEY COULD BE SENT FROM THE UNITED STATES. IF THIS C.B.I. BRANCH IS SET UP, DO YOU THINK YOU WOULD BE INTERESTED IN TAKING ANY COURSES OR STUDYING ANY SUBJECTS BY MAIL*  1. NO, I WOULD NOT BE INTERESTED 2. I MIGHT BE INTERESTED 3. YES, I,M SURE I,D BE INTERESTED 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
